positions.subtitle: apna
positions.description: Key Responsibilities:• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including product managers and designers, to define project    requirements and translate them into actionable technical specifications.• Developed and maintained high-quality, scalable software solutions using modern programming    languages and frameworks, with a focus on performance, reliability, and maintainability.• Participated in code reviews and provided constructive feedback to team members, fostering a culture    of continuous improvement and adherence to best practices.• Actively engaged in agile development methodologies, such as Scrum, ensuring timely delivery of •    software releases and effective communication within the team.• Conducted thorough testing and debugging to identify and resolve software defects, ensuring the    delivery of robust and error-free applications to customers.• Worked closely with DevOps teams to streamline the deployment process and enhance the overall    efficiency of the software development lifecycle.Through my experience at Apna, I have honed my ability to thrive in high-pressure situations, adapt quickly to changing priorities, and deliver high-quality software solutions within tight deadlines. The opportunity to work in such a fast-paced environment has not only expanded my technical expertise but also sharpened my collaboration and communication skills, making me a more effective software engineer.
positions.title: Software Engineer I
positions.description_html:
Key Responsibilities:

• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including product managers and designers, to define project
requirements and translate them into actionable technical specifications.
• Developed and maintained high-quality, scalable software solutions using modern programming
languages and frameworks, with a focus on performance, reliability, and maintainability.
• Participated in code reviews and provided constructive feedback to team members, fostering a culture
of continuous improvement and adherence to best practices.
• Actively engaged in agile development methodologies, such as Scrum, ensuring timely delivery of •
software releases and effective communication within the team.
• Conducted thorough testing and debugging to identify and resolve software defects, ensuring the
delivery of robust and error-free applications to customers.
• Worked closely with DevOps teams to streamline the deployment process and enhance the overall
efficiency of the software development lifecycle.

Through my experience at Apna, I have honed my ability to thrive in high-pressure situations, adapt quickly to changing priorities, and deliver high-quality software solutions within tight deadlines. The opportunity to work in such a fast-paced environment has not only expanded my technical expertise but also sharpened my collaboration and communication skills, making me a more effective software engineer.

positions.subtitle: Lal Bahadur Shastri Hall of Residence IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: • Elected by 1900 boarders to lead a 4 tier Hall council consisting of 4 General Secretaries, 25 Secretaries and 40 Associate Secretaries.• Representative of the student's senate of institute and involved in immense decision making for welfare of 15000+ students.
positions.title: Second Senate Member

• Elected by 1900 boarders to lead a 4 tier Hall council consisting of 4 General Secretaries, 25 Secretaries and 40 Associate Secretaries.
• Representative of the student's senate of institute and involved in immense decision making for welfare of 15000+ students.

positions.description: -Elected by an electorate of 1950+ students to be the General Secretary Social and Cultural of the hall;   Official member of Hall Council;  Signatory of Hall accounts.-Solely managed a budget of 12 lakhs and is solely responsible for smooth conduction of the hall activities   and participation of hall in General Championships.

-Elected by an electorate of 1950+ students to be the General Secretary Social and Cultural of the hall;
Official member of Hall Council; Signatory of Hall accounts.

and participation of hall in General Championships.

positions.subtitle: Lal Bahadur Shastri Hall of Residence, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Assisted in managing an annual budget of INR 12 Lakhs spread across General Championship Events Social & Cultural, illumination & other hall related affairs.Acted as a representative of 1750+ boarders to raise their concern to accountable authority. Led a team of 30 Associates & 70 wing representatives. Part of hall council comprising of 2 senators, 6 general secretaries, & 29 Secretaries
